mapper.select: select mp.mem_pay_no , mp.lesson_no , m.mem_id , m.mem_name , l.lesson_title , mp.payment_date , mp.del_status , l.lesson_prepare , mp.status , l.mem_no , mp.del_name , mp.del_no from mem_pay mp left join lesson l on(l.lesson_no = mp.lesson_no) left join member m on(m.mem_no = mp.mem_no) where l.status = 'Y' and l.lesson_type = '온라인' and l.mem_no = #{memNo} order by mp.payment_date desc
mapper.update: update mem_pay set del_name = #{delName}, del_no = #{delNo}, del_status = '배송중' where mem_pay_no = #{memPayNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) listcount from mem_pay join lesson l using (lesson_no) where l.mem_no = #{memNo} and l.lesson_type='온라인'

select m.lesson_no , l.lesson_title , l.like_count , count(m.lesson_no) student_count , r.star , l.pay_total , s.fee , l.pay_total * (s.fee/100) total_fee , l.pay_total * count(m.lesson_no)-(l.pay_total * (s.fee/100)) salary_total from mem_pay m left join lesson l on (m.lesson_no = l.lesson_no) left join salary s on (l.lesson_no = s.lesson_no) left join review r on (s.lesson_no = r.lesson_no) where l.status = 'Y' and l.mem_no = #{memNo} group by m.lesson_no, l.lesson_title, l.like_count, r.star, l.pay_total, s.fee order by lesson_no desc
